role_id.title: Role Id
role_id.description: UUID of the role assigned to this entity user

token.title: Token
token.description: Bearer token for further API calls

expiration_in.title: Expiration In
expiration_in.description: TC datetime or INT with seconds. Expiration timeout should be configured from configuration files

transaction_date.title: Transaction Date
transaction_date.description: Local date when transaction was executed

transaction_date_utc.title: Transaction Date Utc
transaction_date_utc.description: Optional UTC date and time when transaction was executed

internal_api_partner_transaction_id.title: Internal Api Partner Transaction Id
internal_api_partner_transaction_id.description: Our API partners also have their internal IDs for transactions. This field is allowing the to map our transactions to theirs

card_details_string.title: Card Details String
card_details_string.description: Additional information if transaction was made via plastic card

entity_account_id.title: Entity Account Id
entity_account_id.description: IBAN or other bank account ID

was_created_by_user_name.title: Was Created By User Name
was_created_by_user_name.description: The name of the sender of the payment

was_created_by_user_id.title: Was Created By User Id
was_created_by_user_id.description: ID of the sender of the payment

role_id.title: Role Id
role_id.description: UUID of the role assigned to this entity user

was_created_by_external_user_name.title: Was Created By External User Name

was_created_by_external_user_id.title: Was Created By External User Id

related_object_type.description: Related object type: incoming_bill and so on

payment_object_type.title: payment_object_type
payment_object_type.description: Cash or bank transaction. By default it's bank Transaction

was_created_by_user_name.title: was_created_by_user_name
was_created_by_user_name.description: Name of the user who created the conciliation

was_created_by_user_id.title: was_created_by_user_id
was_created_by_user_id.description: ID of the user who created the conciliation

payment_object_type.title: payment_object_type
payment_object_type.descriptions: Cash or bank transaction. By default it's bank Transaction

was_created_by_user_name.title: Was Created By User Name
was_created_by_user_name.descriptions: Name of the user who created the conciliation

was_created_by_user_id.title: Was Created By User Id
was_created_by_user_id.descriptions: ID of the user who created the conciliation

transaction_date.title: Transaction Date
transaction_date.description: Local date when transaction was executed

transaction_date_utc.title: Transaction Date Utc
transaction_date_utc.description: Optional UTC date and time when transaction was executed

internal_api_partner_transaction_id.title: Internal Api Partner Transaction Id
internal_api_partner_transaction_id.description: Our API partners also have their internal IDs for transactions. This field is allowing the to map our transactions to theirs

card_details_string.title: Card Details String
card_details_string.description: Additional information if transaction was made via plastic card

entity_account_id.title: Entity Account Id
entity_account_id.description: IBAN or other bank account ID
